DOC.brief_summary: This study examines the efficacy of two computer-based training systems to teach children with ADHD to attend more effectively.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial of Computer-based Attention-training Systems in Children With Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
DOC.criteria: child in 6th, 7th or 8th grade a diagnosis of ADHD (any subtype) per report of the child's physician academic achievement at grade level ability to read in English sufficiently to complete assessments and intervention protocols coexisting diagnosis of conduct disorder, pervasive developmental disorder, or other serious mental illness (e.g., bipolar disorder, psychosis)
